keyword: how many calories in a fortune cookie
title: How Many Calories in a Fortune Cookie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a fortune cookie, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrients on a per-cookie basis, with quick tweaks and FAQs for better understanding.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fortune Cookie?
assumptions: Standard commercial fortune cookie, approximately 10 g, thin crispy shell with paper message inside, no added fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and manufacturing; homemade versions may differ. Check packaging when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard fortune cookie contains about 30 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a fortune cookie?
Are fortune cookies high in sugar?
faqs.a: They contain about 3 g of sugars per cookie, mainly from the dough.

faqs.q: Do fortune cookies have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.1 g fat and 0.5 g protein per cookie.

faqs.q: How do calories in fortune cookies compare to other cookies?
faqs.a: Lower than chocolate chip (about 50 kcal) due to simple ingredients.

faqs.q: Can fortune cookies be part of a low-carb diet?
faqs.a: Moderately; 7 g carbs per cookie, but best in small amounts.
